description: Stored data 'value' field is not prefixed with 'json' nor 'xml', which we don't support. Expect error

expected_log_entries.message: GET /cache uuid=36-char-uid-maps-to-actual-xml-value: Cache data was corrupted. Cannot determine type.

expected_output.expected_error_message: GET /cache uuid=36-char-uid-maps-to-actual-xml-value: Cache data was corrupted. Cannot determine type.
